comprehensive_overview: Py-Scikit-Optimize is a Python library designed to optimize hyperparameters and search for the global minimum of a function. It utilizes Bayesian optimization techniques to efficiently search the hyperparameter space and explore various configurations of machine learning models.
core_features: Supports various machine learning libraries like scikit-learn and XGBoost
Ability to customize acquisition functions and surrogate models
Efficiently handles both continuous and categorical hyperparameters
